script:
;;2:花
# script "lisp"
# background %(wayback_background)s
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# fadein "black" 0.5
# textflame 0 0
@
帰り道－

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# bgm "stop"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

# fadein "white" 0.5
# se "SE_0735"
# waitandnext 2
@
…………

@
ふと、
傍らを歩く彼女が足を止めた…

# eye %(unit_a)s "close"
# voice 5006 "megido_0004"
# bgmfile "bgm255" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# textflame 1 1
@メギド
貴方に試練を与えましょう

# eye %(unit_a)s "normal"
@メギド
私と共にあろうとするならば
避けては通れぬ道…

# voice 5006 "megido_0036"
@メギド
私という存在について
持てる知識を披露なさい

# textflame 1 1
@メギド
私が髪飾りで必ず
付けているものは？

# se "SE_0734"
# select "動物" "select_label_1" "花" "select_label_2" "宝石" "select_label_3"
私が髪飾りで必ず
付けているものは？

# label "select_label_1"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_2"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_3"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# sestop "SE_0734"
# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
